Liuzhou prefecture-level city in Guangxi
Liuzhou prefecture in Guangxi

sentences.english: Clearly Liuzhou needs to fill a sizable gap, including rebuilding and upgrading existing public toilets.
sentences.chinese: 因此，柳州需要进行公厕的重建和改造。

sentences.english: Solid Waste Management is also a major issue in Liuzhou.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾管理也是柳州市的一大问题。

sentences.english: Liuzhou is an industry base in southwest China.
sentences.chinese: 柳州是西南地区的工业重镇。

sentences.english: Before we leave, let's buy some souvenir.
sentences.chinese: 回柳州之前，到西街买点纪念品。

sentences.english: Liuzhou is the communication hub in southwest China.
sentences.chinese: 柳州是西南地区的交通枢纽。

sentences.english: Liuzhou is the birthplace of ancestors in South China.
sentences.chinese: 柳州是中国南方人类的发祥地。

sentences.english: Liuzhou is one of the serious acid rain area in China.
sentences.chinese: 柳州市是我国酸雨出现的高频区和严重地区。

sentences.english: Yang Tingli was born in Liuzhou during the Qianlong era of the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 杨廷理是生于清代乾隆年间的柳州人。

sentences.english: Liu Zongyuan's feelings was intriguing in Liuzhou.
sentences.chinese: 柳宗元在柳州时期的情感是错综复杂的。

sentences.english: Designated counseling and testing points are located at City Road in Ping Shan by tuberculosis control.
sentences.chinese: 指定的咨询检测点设在屏山大道柳州市结核病防治所。
